Don Lemon: s claim that "most people can go out and buy an automatic weapon" is disputed by conservative radio host Ben Ferguson, who argues that it is not true.
The gun Lemon bought in Colorado was an: 15, which is described as a semi-automatic weapon, not a fully automatic weapon.
The distinction between a semi: automatic and fully automatic weapon is based on the 1968 Gun Control Act and the 1934 National Firearms Act, which define the terms differently.
